game.name: Cricket 26 - The Official Game of the Ashes
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 새롭게 선보이는 매니지먼트 커리어, 더욱 강력해진 프로 팀, 심화된 애시즈 모드, 향상된 게임플레이와 심층 전략으로 경기장 안팎에서 확장된 통제력을 자랑하는 크리켓 26은 궁극의 대결을 선사합니다. 크리켓 26은 궁극의 대결입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Featuring the all-new Management Career, a bigger and better Pro Team, in-depth Ashes mode, and expanded control on and off the field from enhanced gameplay and in-depth strategies - Cricket 26 is The Ultimate Showdown.

reviewHighlights.text: Bought this game having last played Cricket 19 and I was expecting to see a brand new game by now. Gave them some time to iron out bugs which I unders...
the reverse back sweep is always a boundary or a six, Also sometimes it bugs and doesnt load to the game :( especially after I make a change to the sq...
